narrative.title: 1St Infantry Division - 1942Q4
narrative.situation: British Infantry Division deployed in North Africa during 1942Q4.
narrative.objectives: Assault infantry division specialized in breakthrough operations
narrative.axis_objective: Hold current positions and prevent Allied breakthrough.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and neutralize Axis defensive positions.
